issue.title: [Java] Rename compression classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Zstd isn't using the commons codec, so we should rename CommonsCompressionFactory to something more generic, and the existing LZ4 implementation to something potentially more generic.
